# Master Crepes - Project & Business Context

## Overview
Master Crepes is a premier catering and franchise business based in Miami, FL, specializing in authentic French crêpes. We provide live chef stations for weddings, corporate events, and private parties.

## Core Offerings

### 1. Catering Services
"Bring Paris to Your Event"
- **Live Chef Stations**: Professional chefs preparing crêpes on-site.
- **Menus**:
  - **Sweet**: Classic Nutella, Dulce de Leche, Fresh Berries, Bananas, Homemade Whipped Cream.
  - **Savory/Galettes**: Buckwheat batter (gluten-friendly options). Ham & Swiss, Chicken Florentine, Caprese (Mozzarella, Tomato, Pesto).
- **Event Types**: Weddings, Corporate Galas, Office Lunches, Private Parties, Birthdays, Bar/Bat Mitzvahs.
- **Service Area**: Miami and South Florida.

### 2. Franchises
"Join Our Successful Family"
- **Business Model**: A proven model offering low overhead and high customer appeal.
- **Support**:
  - Site selection assistance.
  - Comprehensive training (Initial & Ongoing).
  - Marketing & Social Media strategies.
  - Detailed Operations Manual.
  - Access to reliable suppliers.
- **Ideal For**: Entrepreneurs looking for a solid brand with a unique product.

### 3. Menu Highlights (Accurate from ToastTab)
- **Savory Crêpes**:
  - *Bacon Lovers*: Hickory smoked bacon bits, ham, melted mozzarella/cheddar blend, topped with two scrambled eggs.
  - *Southwest Omelette*: Ham, red onions, green peppers, vine-ripened tomatoes, melted cheddar, two fluffy eggs.
  - *Veggie Omelette*: Mozzarella, fresh spinach, sautéed portobello mushrooms, red onions, green peppers, tomatoes, two scrambled eggs.
  - *Ham & Cheese*: Thinly sliced savory ham, melted cheese, fresh herbs, drizzle of creamy sauce.
  - *Holy Crepe*: Bacon, tomatoes, melted mozzarella, spring mix, fired egg, chicken or steak, red onions.
  - *Chicken Pesto*: Tender chicken, mushrooms, spinach, tomatoes, melted mozzarella, pesto.
  - *Emperor*: Salad style with grilled chicken or steak, spring mix, mozzarella, tomatoes, mushrooms, Caesar dressing.
  - *Honey Mustard*: Chicken or steak, spring mix, tomatoes, cheddar, bacon bits, honey mustard dressing.
  - *Caprese*: Vine-ripened tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, prosciutto, delicate pesto sauce.
  - *Veggie Delight*: Pesto sauce, spring mix, tomatoes, mushrooms, green peppers, mozzarella, red onions.
  - *Southwest Chipotle*: Chicken or steak, spring mix, tomatoes, cheddar, creamy ancho chipotle dressing.
  - *Teriyaki*: Chicken or steak, spring mix, cheddar/mozzarella, tomatoes, honeyed teriyaki sauce.
  - *Texas BBQ*: Mozzarella, spring mix, red onions, tomatoes, zesty BBQ sauce, chicken or steak.
  - *King Ranch*: Ranch dressing, bacon, cheddar, spring mix, tomatoes, chicken or steak.
  - *Reina Pepiada*: Chicken with onions, mayonnaise, creamy avocado bits, Gouda cheese.
  - *Cordon Bleu*: Chicken breast, diced ham, Swiss cheese, homemade Dijon cream sauce, Parmesan.
  - *Mexican*: Green peppers, spring mix, onions, cheddar/mozzarella, avocado, tomatoes, cilantro, lime, hot sauce, chicken or steak.

- **Sweet Crêpes**:
  - *Dubai Crepe*: Strawberries, pistachio AND chocolate milk spreads, crunchy kataifi topping.
  - *Sweet & Cheesy*: Strawberries, bananas, cheesecake slice, choice of spread (Nutella/Dulce/Pistachio).
  - *Holy Fudge*: Rich chocolate cake slice, Nutella, Oreo crumbles, fudge drizzle.
  - *Nutella*: The classic rich, velvety hazelnut spread.
  - *Dulce de Leche*: Rich, creamy caramel spread.
  - *Strawberry Lovers*: Fresh strawberries with choice of spread.
  - *Banana Lovers*: Ripe bananas with choice of spread.
  - *Strawberry-Banana*: The perfect fruit combo with choice of spread.
  - *Oreo*: Nutella and crunchy Oreo cookie crumbles.
  - *Piru*: Nutella, strawberries, crispy Pirouline wafers.
  - *Cuban Timbita*: Guava, light cream cheese, condensed milk drizzle.

## Navigation Structure
- **/** (Home): Brand introduction, "The Art of French Crepes", Menu Highlights.
- **/catering**: Detailed catering info and "Get a Quote" form.
- **/franchises**: Franchise benefits, "Why Master Crepes", and Application form.
- **/contact**: General contact info, operating hours, map, and inquiry form.
- **/bio**: Linktree-style page for social media bios.
- **Order Online**: External link to ToastTab (https://order.toasttab.com/online/master-crepes-new-3905-nw-107th-ave-106)
